name: Proud to be an AMERICAN 3 Quiz | Wordplay for Kids | 10 Questions

questions.text: Using only letters from AMERICAN, find a 6-letter word for a movie theater.
questions.explanation:
Cinema.

	Cine- is a prefix that refers to motion pictures, and a cinema is where these motion pictures are shown, also known as a theater.  Cinema can also mean the art of making motion pictures.

questions.text: Using only letters from AMERICAN, find a 4-letter word for a female horse.
questions.explanation:
Mare.

	Mares are female horses.  Stallions are male horses.  Baby horses are called colts and foals.

questions.text: Find a 4-letter word for 500 sheets of paper, using only letters from AMERICAN.
questions.explanation:
Ream.

	Reams of paper are usually 500 sheets of paper.  Reams can be connected, and you must tear them to get a single sheet, much like toilet paper, or they can be in stacks that are not attached.  Printer paper can usually be bought in reams.

questions.text: Find a 6-letter word, using only letters from AMERICAN, that is a device that takes pictures.
questions.explanation:
Camera.

	Cameras are devices that take still photos.  These photos can be developed or saved onto a computer for you to enjoy.  Kodak is a popular brand of camera.

questions.text: Using letters found in AMERICAN, find a 3-letter word meaning an edge.
questions.explanation:
Rim.

	A rim is the edge, usually of a wheel or a cup.  A rim can also be the frame of a pair of glasses.

questions.text: Find a 4-letter word that means to tend to, using only the letters in AMERICAN.
questions.explanation:
Care.

	To care means to watch over something, or to tend to it.  Care can also mean worry, and to take care means to watch out for danger.

questions.text: What is a 4-letter word that means 43,560 square feet, using only letters from the word AMERICAN?
questions.explanation:
Acre.

	Acres are a unit of measurement, usually to denote land area.  An acre is about 43,560 square feet, or 4,047 square meters.  The way you would type this is 4,047 m^2, or 43,560 ft^2.

questions.text: Find a word, using only letters from AMERICAN, that is 4 letters long and ends a prayer.
questions.explanation:
Amen.

	Amen literally means "so be it", or "let it be so".  This means you agree with the prayer and you back it up.  Saying "amen to that" means you agree entirely.

questions.text: Using only letters in AMERICAN, find a name from the Bible, the man who killed Abel, that is 4 letters long.
questions.explanation:
Cain.

	Cain was jealous of his brother, Abel.  God accepted Abel's sacrifice of his best sheep and did not accept Cain's gift of leftover fruits and vegetables.  Cain grew more and more jealous of his brother, and it eventually turned to hatred.  Cain eventually committed the first murder, killing his brother.

questions.text: Find a 4-letter word, using only letters from AMERICAN, that means a spice related to nutmeg, or Mr. Windu from the "Star Wars" movies.
questions.explanation:
Mace.

	Mace is made from the same plant as nutmeg, and is the main ingredient in pepper spray.  Mace Windu is a character from the first three "Star Wars" movies, and is played by Samuel Jackson.  He is on the Jedi Council.
